ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if I am still allowed to control Chordate. So if KSL says I m not, this post is void. ... Chordate enters the bridge after his trip to the CR

I don't know if I am still allowed to control Chordate. So if KSL says I'm 
not, this post is void.

::Chordate::

Chordate enters the bridge after his trip to the CR chamber, rubbing him head 
where the wound had once been. He shakes his head, cursing the pit for the 
presence of insane bots.

Sitting down in his normal chair, Chordate looks at the security cameras, his 
eyes widening when he sees Koj flying through the halls. Swearing under his 
breath as he taps a few buttons, Chordate activates a lockdown of the 
corridor, doors closing and locking in the area where Koj was. Autoguns stand 
ready as Chordate activates the intercom, setting it to only sound in Koj's 
area.

"Stop where you are," he says, "Why are you smashing through doors?"
